thread.title: Dugald MacArthur, 86, teacher and man of the theater

title: Dugald MacArthur, 86, teacher and man of the theater
text:
Published By: Philly Performing Arts - Today 
Dugald MacArthur, 86, of Elkins Park, a director and acting teacher prominent in the Philadelphia theater community, died Tuesday, Sept. 29,...
